CmdLine: apk --no-cache add --virtual build-dependencies git ca-certificates     && git clone https://github.com/claudioc/jingo.git /opt/jingo     && cd /opt/jingo     && LATEST_TAG=$(git tag -l 'v*.[0-9]' --sort='v:refname'| tail -1); git checkout $LATEST_TAG -b $LATEST_TAG     && git config --global user.name "Jingo Wiki" && git config --global user.email "everyone@jingo"     && npm install     && sed -ri 's#"./jingo -c config.yaml"#"./jingo -c config/config.yaml"#' /opt/jingo/package.json     && mkdir -p /opt/jingo/config
Commands.Name: run
